name: GetContactParticipationsBreakdown
description:
Retrieve a contact's event participation details by ID or email.

This tool retrieves participation details for a specific contact in marketing events using their email or internal ID. It is useful for analyzing a contact's engagement in various events.

parameters.name: contact_identifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the contact, which can be either an email or an internal ID.

value_schema.description: The identifier of the Contact. It may be email or internal id.

parameters.name: participation_state
parameters.description: The participation state for the contact. Options: REGISTERED, CANCELLED, ATTENDED, NO_SHOW.

value_schema.description: The participation state value. It may be REGISTERED, CANCELLED, ATTENDED, NO_SHOW

parameters.name: response_size_limit
parameters.description: Specify the maximum number of participation records to return. The default is 10, and the maximum is 100.

value_schema.description: The limit for response size. The default value is 10, the max number is 100

parameters.name: pagination_cursor
parameters.description: Cursor for the last retrieved item to manage pagination.

value_schema.description: The cursor indicating the position of the last retrieved item.

metadata.description: Arcade Starter tools for LLMs to interact directly with the low-level Hubspot Marketing API

parameters.name: state
parameters.description: The participation state value. It may be REGISTERED, CANCELLED, ATTENDED, NO_SHOW

value_schema.description: The participation state value. It may be REGISTERED, CANCELLED, ATTENDED, NO_SHOW

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The limit for response size. The default value is 10, the max number is 100

value_schema.description: The limit for response size. The default value is 10, the max number is 100

parameters.name: after
parameters.description: The cursor indicating the position of the last retrieved item.

value_schema.description: The cursor indicating the position of the last retrieved item.

parameters.name: contactIdentifier
parameters.description: The identifier of the Contact. It may be email or internal id.

value_schema.description: The identifier of the Contact. It may be email or internal id.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
